name: Getting there
content:
Getting there

travel

ExCeL is easily accessible by public transport, offers free cycle parking and has ample car parking on site.

Click here for more information about travelling to ExCeL.

ExCeL London
One Western Gateway
Royal Victoria Dock
London E16 1XL

Click here to see a map highlighting all bus routes to ExCeL London.

During Ecobuild shuttle buses will run from the Thames Clipper river taxi stop at Canary Wharf (10 minutes) and from London City Airport (5 minutes).

hotels

A variety of accommodation options are available within close proximity to ExCeL, including properties on site at ExCeL itself, in the City of London, Canary Wharf and at other London locations with excellent transport links to the venue.

Please note: There is high demand for hotel accommodation during Ecobuild. For the best range of hotels, and the most advantageous rates, we recommend that you make your reservations as soon as possible.
